review:
Total satisfaction with the treatment provided. Very professional and a good doctor. 
All modern equipments are available with helpful staff. 
Dr. Shilpa Explained the issue and accordingly treated without and delay.

It was a great experience with Dr.Shilpa. She is very good with her work,  I went there to do cleaning n filling but she told me I had to go for root canal in one of my tooth, I was really scared to get it done but she made me feel  really comfortable telling me that it was painless and it actually was from what I was expecting to be. I recommend all of you to go to her clinic if you are looking for a good dentist and moreover  her clinic was very peaceful n hygienic aswell. Thank you Dr. Shilpa  Bharti.  

From Levis

I am from London,I am in India on a study tour . I visited Dr Shilpa's 32 forever dental centre on 23 April 2016 . I must admit I was pleasantly surprised by the hygiene level and professionalism in the clinic . the standard here are almost the same which I get back in London but prices are so less . kudos !

Wonderful ,wonderful , soooo happy with the painless treatment .found the clinic while passing through malviya nagar main road, was a little hesitant to go inside , but once stepped inside the clinic    half my fear was already gone ¬° nicely done boutique style clinic ,I liked the person attention and care given to me at 32 forever dental clinic . well done guys ,,, good job , keep it up !!! Dr and the team was very friendly and polite, my treatment plan was well explained to me and so far my braces treatment is going as per my expectation. I got my full mouth braces done, before the treatment start ed I visited many clinis in south Delhi and after my research I found 32forever to be most cost effective with very good infrastructure.

As a patient implant is a very new concept to me.......but Dr shilpa explained it so well. And the whole process was so smooth I am glad I visited her. And all young people..........I pray no one has to undergo replacement of teeth, but if one has to nothing better then implants.

Thank you doctor for making my dental treatment so smooth. Best part is the machines are very latest. Before starting the treatment the condition of mouth is shown to the patient, so there is no chance of bluffing. Like her up to date facilities and knowledge.

I am a student in Delhi......so was not knowing which doctor to visit for my braces requirement, a friend referred me to Dr shilpa. Believe me I was so glad that I am in safe hand, I was scared that just to make money Dr should not do any treatment for me. Dr shilpa show me the condition of my mouth through some dental camera...... Explained everything and then suggested right treatment. Cheers_to her

Dr shilpa has an excellent team of doctors.......I was very very stressed out as I had to get my wisdom tooth extraction. Dr ujjwal gul!at I made the whole experience damn smooth.....it wrapped up the whole thing in 15 mins.  Thank you soooooo much for everything.

She is a specialist Dr in treating old patients...... Even I did not know before that in dentist also there is special Dr for old patients........after being treated by her now I know what is the difference between a BDS and MDS Dr. Every one in MALVIYA NAGAR SOCIETY I recommend you this dr

Today I complete my braces treatment.......it took 7 month. All through the treatment Dr nishtha and Dr shilpa took poker care of me and my regular appointment. They kept motivating me though out the treatment. Thank you doctors I owe you my smile.....ha ha ha

very good doctor , and very neat and clean clinic . I liked the hygiene part . Dentist is very experience and caring. I feel their equipments are latest and that is why I did not feel any pain . over all highly satisfied . surely worth my recommendation.

Everything from start till finish has been WONDERFUL my wife and myself are over satisfied with the whole treatment. Very friendly and professional doctor. When I saw the before and after pictures of my mouth I could not Believe it. It looks so natural and feels so good. Thank you
